QuestData.Title: Death in the Depths
QuestData.Description: My own people have fallen to the mad whispers of the voices of the deep, deep sea.$b$bCultists inhabit caves in the ocean, spreading hysteria deeper and deeper into Tiragarde with their mad rituals.$b$bWe must put an end to them, $n, before they get even more out of hand.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Deepwarden Followers in Krakenbane Cove.
QuestData.RewardText: Perhaps now the danger may come to an end.
